description: Removes a target from a maintenance window.

parameters.name: WindowId
parameters.description: The ID of the maintenance window the target should be removed from.

parameters.name: WindowTargetId
parameters.description: The ID of the target definition to remove.

nested_items.name: WindowId
nested_items.description: The ID of the maintenance window the target was removed from.

nested_items.name: WindowTargetId
nested_items.description: The ID of the removed target definition.
